pageContext.claim: “I'm not reversing course. I have done something that nobody else has been able to do. In another short period of time, like hours -- you'll be hearing 'hours and days' -- you'll be hearing about the caliphate.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is reversing course on Syria. Previously, he said he would withdraw all U.S. personnel from Syria, but now under pressure, he agreed to keep 400 troops on the ground.
